segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen looks like a total slob fest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is spewing water everywhere, what a filthy overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle on the floor? That's disgusting and unsanitary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's stepping in it while drying her plate—gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinets are getting soaked; it'll warp and smell musty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing around in this mess for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand deep in the jar—hope it's clean in there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool tipping on wet floor? That's begging for a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, probably tracking dirt everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats in this chaos is just irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene turns my stomach with its disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the neat garden can't redeem this indoor filth.
segments.speaker: PAR
